summary: CPA Financial Accountant specializing in financial reporting and analysis. Experienced in managing licensing and royalty reporting for international brands (Disney, Warner Bros. and LEGO). Over 5 years in financial reporting and management accounting. Multicultural, bilingual (English & Chinese). Proficient in ERP/accounting systems and Microsoft Excel. Holds Master of Business: Accounting and CPA Australia license. Led development of an Excel tool to monitor minimum guarantees across 150+ licensing contracts.

experience.title: Financial Accountant
experience.description: Financial Reporting: Provide accurate, timely financial reports (B/S, P/L, Cash Flow) for management and external parties; apply AUS-IFRS accounting standards and company policy. Royalty Reporting: Manage 150+ royalty reports, monthly or quarterly, for Warner Bros, Mattel, Disney and LEGO; verify sales reports against licensing contracts, royalty rates and other funds; oversee royalty payments and withholding tax.

experience.title: Assistant Accountant
experience.description: Cash flow / Foreign currency management; manage banking and daily reconciliations; staff expense management via Concur-SAP; AP, AR and payroll; oversee payroll and financial controls; coordinate with International logistics.

experience.title: Assistant Accountant
experience.description: Ensure transactions comply with financial policies; prepare, verify and process invoices; code payments; maintain general ledger and formal banking/invoicing using MYOB and RMS; manage accounts receivable and payable.

experience.title: Front Office Officer
experience.description: Take bookings; cash/payment handling; promote and sell products/services; online customer service; client care; assist with office/administrative tasks.

experience.title: Internship - Credit Officer
experience.description: Administrative support; handle credit card inquiries from corporate clients; assess credit applications; gain knowledge of commercial banking regulations and credit products; liaise with managers and maintain client relationships.
